review: To be frank I love it. I love anything from amazon because it has been the only company that has never disappointed me. I pre ordered this for 20 bucks when it came out, so I got a great deal. This was estimated to come to my house in January 05, 2015, but amazon was kind enough to send it on December 16, 2014. It is easy to use, and has a friendly interface. I used to watch prime and netflix movies first, but then I got into developer mode and installed some android apps such as crunchy roll etc. My father ordered something else from ebay I think which was more expensive. It had an android interface with play store, but the fire tv stick beats it in loading movies. The only thing I wish the fire TV stick had is more memory.
